SQL.LOAD: SELECT EQUIPMENT_IMAGE_ID, EQUIPMENT_ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, PATH, IMAGE_TYPE_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY, '' as IMAGE_TYPE FROM ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT_IMAGE WHERE EQUIPMENT_IMAGE_ID = :equipment_image_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT EI.EQUIPMENT_IMAGE_ID, EI.EQUIPMENT_ID, EI.CODE, EI.DESCRIPTION, EI.PATH, EI.IMAGE_TYPE_ID, EI.CREATED_DATE, EI.MODIFIED_DATE, EI.CREATED_BY, EI.MODIFIED_BY, DIT.TRANSLATION AS IMAGE_TYPE FROM ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT_IMAGE EI, ELP_LIST L, ELP_LIST_ITEM LI, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION DIT WHERE L.LIST_ID = LI.LIST_ID AND LI.LIST_ITEM_ID = EI.IMAGE_TYPE_ID AND LI.DICT_ITEM_ID = DIT.DICT_ITEM_ID AND DIT.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id AND EI.EQUIPMENT_ID = :equipment_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT_IMAGE ( EQUIPMENT_IMAGE_ID, EQUIPMENT_ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, PATH, IMAGE_TYPE_ID ) VALUES ( :equipment_image_id, :equipment_id, :code, :description, :path, :image_type_id )
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT_IMAGE SET CODE = :code, DESCRIPTION = :description, PATH = :path, IMAGE_TYPE_ID = :image_type_id, EQUIPMENT_ID = :equipment_id WHERE EQUIPMENT_IMAGE_ID = :equipment_image_id
